definitions.usage_example: According to the news, it will rain tomorrow.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to cite the source of information.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para citar la fuente de la información.

definitions.usage_example: The game was canceled due to the rain.
definitions.usage_example_es: El partido fue cancelado debido a la lluvia.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to give the reason for something (synonym of 'because of').
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para dar la razón de algo (sinónimo de 'because of').

definitions.usage_example: He was late because of the traffic.
definitions.usage_example_es: Llegó tarde a causa del tráfico.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to give the reason for something (synonym of 'due to').
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para dar la razón de algo (sinónimo de 'due to').

definitions.usage_example: He went out in spite of the rain.
definitions.usage_example_es: Salió a pesar de la lluvia.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to show a contrast or unexpected outcome (synonym of 'despite').
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para mostrar un contraste o resultado inesperado (sinónimo de 'despite').

definitions.usage_example: He went out despite the rain.
definitions.usage_example_es: Salió a pesar de la lluvia.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to show a contrast or unexpected outcome (synonym of 'in spite of').
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para mostrar un contraste o resultado inesperado (sinónimo de 'in spite of').

definitions.usage_example: I will have tea instead of coffee.
definitions.usage_example_es: Tomaré té en lugar de café.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to indicate a replacement or alternative.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para indicar un reemplazo o alternativa.

definitions.usage_example: The car is in front of the house.
definitions.usage_example_es: El carro está en frente de la casa.
definitions.usage_context_en: Positioned directly ahead or at the front of something.
definitions.usage_context_es: Posicionado directamente adelante o al frente de algo.

definitions.meaning: En nombre de / De parte de
definitions.usage_example: I am speaking on behalf of my team.
definitions.usage_example_es: Estoy hablando en nombre de mi equipo.
definitions.usage_context_en: As a representative of someone or for someone's benefit.
definitions.usage_context_es: Como representante de alguien o para el beneficio de alguien.

definitions.usage_example: In addition to English, he speaks French.
definitions.usage_example_es: Además de inglés, él habla francés.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to add another item or piece of information.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para añadir otro ítem o pieza de información.

definitions.usage_example: Please finish the report prior to the meeting.
definitions.usage_example_es: Por favor termina el informe antes de la reunión.
definitions.usage_context_en: A formal way to say 'before' a specific time or event.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una forma formal de decir 'antes de' un tiempo o evento específico.

definitions.meaning: En cuanto a / Con respecto a
definitions.usage_example: As for the money, we will pay you tomorrow.
definitions.usage_example_es: En cuanto al dinero, te pagaremos mañana.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to introduce a new topic or change the subject.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para introducir un nuevo tema o cambiar de tema.

definitions.meaning: A diferencia de / En lugar de
definitions.usage_example: I prefer tea, as opposed to coffee.
definitions.usage_example_es: Prefiero el té, a diferencia del café.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to make a direct contrast between two things.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para hacer un contraste directo entre dos cosas.

definitions.usage_example: The store is open every day apart from Sunday.
definitions.usage_example_es: La tienda está abierta todos los días excepto el domingo.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to mean 'except for' or 'not including'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para significar 'excepto por' o 'sin incluir'.

definitions.usage_example: Apart from the salary, the job is great.
definitions.usage_example_es: Además del salario, el trabajo es genial.

definitions.usage_example: He bought the car regardless of the cost.
definitions.usage_example_es: Compró el carro sin importar el costo.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to mean 'without paying attention to' or 'despite'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para significar 'sin prestar atención a' o 'a pesar de'.

definitions.usage_example: We succeeded thanks to your help.
definitions.usage_example_es: Tuvimos éxito gracias a tu ayuda.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to show a positive reason for a good outcome.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para mostrar una razón positiva para un buen resultado.
